account.notFoundDescription: The account you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deleted.

header.updateError: An error occured while trying to update account

unlink.error: An error occured while trying to unlink account
unlink.title: Unlink account from bank connection
unlink.description: This will convert the account to a system account and preserve all transaction data.
unlink.autoSyncWarning: The account will no longer sync automatically.
unlink.reconnectionInfo: You can reconnect this account to a bank connection later from the Settings tab. After reconnection syncing will start from the latest transaction date.
unlink.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to unlink?
unlink.dialogDescription: This action will disconnect your account from its bank connection and convert it to a system account.
unlink.willBecomeSystemType: Account will become a "system" type (manual updates only)
unlink.transactionsPreserved: All existing transactions will be preserved
unlink.connectionHistorySaved: Connection history will be saved for potential future reconnection
unlink.confirmAccountName: Type the account name to confirm:

deletion.error: An error occured while trying to delete account
deletion.title: Delete this account
deletion.description: Once you delete the account, there is no going back.
deletion.transactionsWarning: All the transactions will be deleted.
deletion.transactionCount: You have {count} transactions associated with this account, they will also be deleted.
deletion.deleteConfirm: Do you really want to delete this account?

link.title: Link account to bank connection
link.description: Connect this system account to a bank connection for automatic transaction syncing.
link.listItem1: Account will become linked to the selected bank connection
link.listItem2: Existing transactions will be converted to bank type (preserving all data)
link.listItem3: If balances differ, an adjustment transaction will be created
link.dialogDescription: Select a bank connection and the corresponding external account to link.
link.adjustmentNote: If balances differ, an adjustment transaction will be created automatically.

group.label: Account group
group.tooltip: Group multiple accounts together to keep your dashboard sidebar organized

visibility.label: Hidden:
visibility.tooltip: Hidden accounts are not visible on the Dashboard, won't affect statistics, and won't be automatically synced via bank connection until re-enabled.

loadTransactions.title: Load transactions for selected period
loadTransactions.notLinked: This account is not linked to a bank connection

syncTransactions.title: Sync latest transactions
syncTransactions.notLinked: This account is not linked to a bank connection

relinkWarning.title: Enable Banking: Account needs update
relinkWarning.description: This account needs to be updated due to a data schema change. First, try reconnecting via
